# extract-llms-docs

> Extract documentation for AI agents from any site with llms.txt support. Features MCP server, REST API, batch processing, and multiple export formats.

## Overview

extract-llms-docs is an open-source project by nirholas. Extract documentation for AI agents from any site with llms.txt support. Features MCP server, REST API, batch processing, and multiple export formats.

## Repository

- URL: https://github.com/nirholas/extract-llms-docs
- Language: TypeScript
- License: MIT
- Author: nirholas

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome. See CONTRIBUTING.md for guidelines.
